alert.note: Alert for Winston (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 25 at 1:25PM CDT until May 25 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN WINSTON AND NORTHWESTERN NESHOBA COUNTIES... At 125 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Zama, or 12 miles northeast of Edinburg, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Stallo around 130 PM CDT. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
